pathways.name: Amazon Coding Bootcamp
pathways.description: Master the necessary data structures and algorithms to help you ace the technical interviews at your favorite companies

summary.value: What Will You be Learning?
Our curriculum consists of three modules i.e. Basic, Intermediate and Advanced, which can be completed at your own pace. A breakdown of the modules is as below:
Module 1: aims to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the Java Programming Language, enabling them to become familiar with its syntax and key concepts.
Module 2: Students will be introduced to Data Structures and Algorithms, empowering them with the knowledge necessary to tackle complex programming problems and optimize code efficiency.
Module 3: Designed to inform students about the various Internship roles available at Amazon while also equipping them with the necessary Aptitude and Logical Reasoning skills.

In addition to the technical curriculum, we offer dedicated workshops to help you develop soft skills such as resume building and leveraging social network platforms like LinkedIn and Twitter. Our experienced instructors will guide you every step of the way, and you'll receive daily assignments and homework tasks to practice the concepts covered in class.

pathways.sub_heading: Foundations of Data Structures and Algorithms

summary.value: This Digital Literacy course has been curated by Peepul (https://www.peepulindia.org/) for building capacity of teachers at Municipal Corporation of Delhi (MCD) Schools. This course will give the user an overview of:
Scratch Jr (Block-based Programming)
Microsoft Word
Microsoft Excel
Google Forms
Benefits and Applications of this course:

This course will help teachers in their professional roles and responsibilities, by: Introducing Block based programming by promoting the integration of coding and computational thinking across different subjects.
Developing skills such as problem - solving, algorithmic and critical thinking,
Creativity and problem-solving skills.
Helping in score card creation and managing student data in Excel.
Drafting official documents using Word.
Creating Assessment through google forms.
यह Digital Literacy Course Peepul (https://www.peepulindia.org/) द्वारा दिल्ली नगर निगम (MCD) स्कूलों में शिक्षकों की क्षमता निर्माण के लिए बनाया गया है। यह course उपयोगकर्ता को इसका अवलोकन देगा:
Scratch Jr (Block-based Programming)
Microsoft Word
Microsoft Excel
Google Forms
इस पाठ्यक्रम के लाभ और अनुप्रयोग:
यह कोर्स शिक्षकों को उनकी पेशेवर भूमिकाओं और जिम्मेदारियों में मदद करेगा:
विभिन्न विषयों में coding और computational thinking के एकीकरण को बढ़ावा देकर block based programming का परिचय।
Problem solving, algorithmic and critical thinking, creativity जैसे कौशल विकसित करना।
स्कोर कार्ड बनाने और Excel में छात्र data के प्रबंधन में मदद करना।
Word का उपयोग करके आधिकारिक दस्तावेज़ तैयार करना।Google forms के माध्यम से मूल्यांकन बनाना।
